messages.subject: Samurai Archives WEB ADDRESS UPDATE
messages.msgSnippet: The server for the samurai archives has been changed, and is currently being hosted at:  http://samurai.bigsitecity.com (www.techjapanese.com/samurai is no
messages.messageBody:
The server for the 'samurai archives' has been changed, and is
currently being hosted at: http://samurai.bigsitecity.com
(www.techjapanese.com/samurai is no longer valid) there are some
broken links now due to this move, including some in the downloads
section, so please bear with us, and please update your bookmarks
accordingly. We should *hopefully* have the situation back to normal
within the week.

C.E.West
